rukus.text: Ketiya'o nahaya, candrara sapata
raatira sapata, yetiya iyara arasana ghate
prabhatara sapata, yetiya i alokojjbala haya
niscaya jahannama mahabipadasamuhara an'yatama
manuhara babe satarkakaraisbaraupa
Tomalokara majata yiye agrasara ha’ba bicarae athaba pichamuraa ha’ba bicarae tara babe
Pratyeka byakti nija krtakarmara babe dayabad'dha
kintu sompanthi lokasakalara bahirae
jannatata te'omloke ijane sijanaka sudhiba
aparaadhibilakara bisaye
kihe tomalokaka chakbarata (jahannamata) niksepa karaiche
sihamte ka’ba, ‘ami chalata adayakaraisakalara antarbhukta nachilo
‘arau ami dukhiyaka khadya dana karaa nachilo
arau ami anarthaka alocanakaraisakalara lagata behuda alaca karaata magna achilo
Arau ami pratidana dirasaka asbikara karaichilo
arasesata amara ocarata mrtyu ahi pale’
Eteke chuparaichakaraisakalara chuparaiche sihamtara kono upakara nakaraiba
Eteke sihamtara ki haiche, kiya sihamte upadesa banira paraa bimukha haiche
sihamte yena bhita-santrasta hai palayanarata banaraiya gadha
Yiborae sinhara bhayata palayana karaiche
Baram sihamtara majara pratyeka byaktiye'i kamana karae ye taka unmukta grantha pradana karaa ha'oka
Ketiya'o nahaya, baram sihamte akhiraataka bhaya nakarae
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'i kora'ana sakalorae babe upadesabani
Eteke yara iccha si iyara paraa upadesa grahana karaka
Arau allahara icchabihina konorae'i upadesa grahana karaiba noraarae teraemi bhayara yogya, kerala te'omrae'i takbaraa aralambana karaa, arau teraemi ksama karaara adhikarai
